<!--화합물_정보--> {{TemplateMapping | mapToClass = ChemicalCompound | correspondingClass = ChemicalCompound | mappings = {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }} {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별칭 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }} {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = IUPAC | ontologyProperty = iupacName }} {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = CAS | ontologyProperty = casNumber }} {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 밀도 | ontologyProperty = density | unit = Density }} {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹는점 | ontologyProperty = meltingPoint | unit = Temperature }} {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 끓는점 | ontologyProperty = boilingPoint | unit = Temperature }} end}}
<!-- Not Yet Mapping |화학식= |분자식= |상온상태= |원자량 = |분자량= |용해도= |용해성= |상온색= |상온상태= |상온색= |기체= |기체1= |액체= |액체1= |고체= |고체1= |섭취= |흡입= |피부= |눈= |R-phrase= -->
